title: Karsten Gresch
bio: 5*dad. Dev love for Rust, Svelte, Quarkus. OSS and Open Culture maniac. Culturegeek (poetry, music, digiarts). Blank/Dorf, MJ DeMarco, Fowler, Kim/Behr/Spafford, Laloux, Poppendieck, Vernon, Ford, Martin, Sutton are some of my heroes. Working as Solution Architect with Red Hat.
